message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can adjust as needed in future rounds.
You started high, I'll start high too
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. You can't have it all!
You're not getting it all, but I'm willing to give you a decent chunk
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve more. You're not getting off that easily!
